responses: Hello, Kindly choose from one of the following to get started.

Prerana  Education Society's Institute of Technology,Management (PESITM) was established in 2007 under the state of karnataka education & recognized by Vishveswaraiya technological University(VTU). For more details please choose from below options.
We have 1500+ students studying with us.
To visit the campus you can proceed by choosing further below options.
The address of PESITM is: Prerana  Education Societys,Institute of Technology, Management NH-206,Sagar Road Shivamogga-577204. Karnataka, India
You can visit us between 9 AM to 4:30 PM from MONDAY to SATURDAY.
You can contact us on: 0253 2970077, 0253 2970078 , 9022025101 , Email us on: pesitmoffice@pestrust.edu.in, principalpesitm@gmail.com
We provide below mentioned courses. Please select one to know more.
What do you want to know about Computer science engineering? Please choose further to know.
Please select one from below options
PESITM has intake of 180 students for First Year
PESITM has intake of 20 students for DSY[NOTE: Intake number varies every academic year.]
Select a category to know the fee
Fee for an OPEN category student is : RS 72000 (Excluding university exam fee)
Fee for an OBC category student is : RS 1,11,884 (Excluding university exam fee)
Fee for a SC/ST category student is RS 45000 (Excluding university exam fee)

The criteria for Engineering in PESITM are as follows: A minimum aggregate of 50% or equivalent in 10+2.Compulsory Subjects: Physics & Mathematics; and anyone of the following: Chemistry, Computer Science. Minimum passing mark is essential in each of the subject.
The duration for the Engineering offered at PESITM is 4 years.
